snippet: The fates of Curtis Granderson, Hiroki Kuroda and Robinson Cano are uncertain after all three turned down initial offers from the Yankees.
abstract: Fates of Curtis Granderson, Hiroki Kuroda and Robinson Cano are uncertain after all three turn down initial offers from the New York Yankees; any of the three could still re-sign with the Yankees, but if they sign with other teams, Yankees will receive a draft pick as compensation; most likely to leave the Yankees is Granderson.

byline.contributor: Tim Rohan contributed reporting from Orlando, Fla.

lead_paragraph: The fates of Curtis Granderson, Hiroki Kuroda and Robinson Cano are uncertain after all three turned down initial offers from the Yankees.

headline.main: Maneuvering Begins as Three Yankees Rebuff Offers
headline.print_headline: Maneuvering Starts as 3 Yanks Reject Offers
